entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
